Desc.eng: Help me, stranger! I’m thirsty! My family needs water! Help us!
Sorry, I’m confused. Katarina, do Borgovians say “water” instead of “food”?
There is a huge water tank in the vicinity. But a group of evil beasts wants to make us pay for the water!
That’s truly a disgrace. I’ll help you.
I can’t help you with that. But here’s my water flask.
And how can I help you?
No, you heard right. With all these factories around Borgova the soil is polluted. The water is tainted in the rookery and the soldier-machines won’t let us enter the downtown.
